DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether non-drug intensive program help improve control type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Program Non-pharmacological Intervention Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: This study base creation two group patient type 2 diabetes mellitus period six month . In one group intensive program develop : group medical consultation , workshop , informative talk , `` expert patient `` telephone inquiry .. etc . Meanwhile , control group follow consultation usual . We make determination HbA1c 3 month 6 month later ass whether significant difference two group .
DOC.criteria: Patients type 2 diabetes mellitus poor control disease . No change make pharmacological previous 3 month . Changes drug treatment past 3 month .
